title: myTime StopWatch Face Digital
summary: Simple, lightweight and customizable Digital Watch Face with stopwatch.
description: myTime StopWatch Face Digital is a simple, clean and fast standalone watch face with stopwatch function included.Designed for round and square devices.Simple and practical stopwatch.Customize your watch face directly on the watch, in a easy and fast way.Features:- Date (8 different formats)- Watch Battery- 19 Background Colors- 29 Colors and 12 different Fonts for NumbersNumerous combinations.
descriptionHTML:
myTime StopWatch Face Digital is a simple, clean and fast standalone watch face with stopwatch function included.

Designed for round and square devices.

Simple and practical stopwatch.

Customize your watch face directly on the watch, in a easy and fast way.

Features:

- Date (8 different formats)

- Watch Battery

- 19 Background Colors

- 29 Colors and 12 different Fonts for Numbers

Numerous combinations.
